languages.text: "Воистину. Вероятно, они начали вербовку среди рабочих — в их массах просто скрыться. Под видом союза техноматов они получили ширму для тайных операций и проникновения в эшелоны власти. Каждый кризис позволял им завоевать наше доверие и получить ресурсы".

"Indeed. They probably began by recruiting workers — it is easy to blend in with the labouring riffraff. Posing as a union of technomats, they were able to conceal their secret operations and infiltration into the upper echelons of power. Each new crisis allowed them to gain more of our trust and resources."
languages.original_text: "Воистину. Вероятно, они начали вербовку среди рабочих — в их массах просто скрыться. Под видом союза техноматов они получили ширму для тайных операций и проникновения в эшелоны власти. Каждый кризис позволял им завоевать наше доверие и получить ресурсы".

traits.locale_text: "Indeed. They probably have started to recruit the workers — it is easy to get lost among them. Disguising as the Technomat union, they gained a cover for their secret operations and infiltration of the echelons of authority. Each crisis allowed them to gain our trust and receive resources."

"Indeed. They probably have started to recruit the workers — it is easy to get lost among them. Disguising as the Technomat union, they gained a cover for their secret operations and infiltration of the echelons of authority. Each crisis allowed them to gain our trust and receive resources."

Posing as a union of technomats, they were able to conceal their secret operations and infiltration into the upper echelons of power. Each new crisis allowed them to gain more of our trust and resources."

Disguising themselves as technomats, they gained a cover for their secret operations and infiltration into the upper echelons of power. Each crisis allowed them to gain our trust and receive our resources."

Each crisis allowed them to gain our trust and receive our resources."

Posing as a union of technomats, they were able to conceal their secret operations and infiltration into the upper echelons of power. Each new crisis allowed them to gain more of our trust and resources."

Posing as a union of technomats, they were able to conceal their secret operations and infiltration into the upper echelons of power. Each new crisis allowed them to gain more of our trust and resources."

"Indeed. They probably began by recruiting workers — it is easy to blend in with the labouring riffraff. Posing as a union of technomats, they were able to conceal their secret operations and infiltration into the upper echelons of power. Each new crisis allowed them to gain more of our trust and resources."

languages.text: “确实如此。他们多半已经开始招聘工人了，因为他们很容易混入工人群体之中。他们伪装成了技工，为他们的秘密行动与权力渗透提供掩护。每当达戈努斯发生新的危机时，他们都会协助我们，以此逐步取得我们的信任，获得更多资源。”
languages.original_text: "Indeed. They probably began by recruiting workers — it is easy to blend in with the labouring riffraff. Posing as a union of technomats, they were able to conceal their secret operations and infiltration into the upper echelons of power. Each new crisis allowed them to gain more of our trust and resources."

traits.locale_text: “确实如此。他们多半已经开始招聘工人了，因为他们很容易混入工人群体之中。他们伪装成了技工，为他们的秘密行动与权力渗透提供掩护。每当达戈努斯发生新的危机时，他们都会协助我们，以此逐步取得我们的信任，获得更多资源。”
“确实如此。他们可能已经开始招聘工人了，因为他们很容易混入工人群体之中。他们伪装成了技工，为他们的秘密行动与权力渗透提供掩护。每当达戈努斯发生危机时，他们都会协助我们，以此逐步取得我们的信任，获得更多资源。”

languages.text: «Efectivamente. Es probable que empezaran reclutando trabajadores; es fácil mezclarse con esa muchedumbre. Haciéndose pasar por un grupo de tecnómatas, consiguieron ocultar sus operaciones secretas y se infiltraron en la cúpula del poder. Cada nueva crisis les valió más confianza y recursos por nuestra parte».
languages.original_text: "Indeed. They probably began by recruiting workers — it is easy to blend in with the labouring riffraff. Posing as a union of technomats, they were able to conceal their secret operations and infiltration into the upper echelons of power. Each new crisis allowed them to gain more of our trust and resources."

traits.locale_text: «Efectivamente. Es probable que empezaran reclutando trabajadores; es fácil mezclarse con esa muchedumbre. Haciéndose pasar por un grupo de tecnómatas, consiguieron ocultar sus operaciones secretas y se infiltraron en la cúpula del poder. Cada nueva crisis les valió más confianza y recursos por nuestra parte».

languages.text: 「確かに。奴らはおそらく労働者を勧誘し始めたのだろう...労働者の中に紛れ込むのは簡単だからな。テクノマットを装うことで、奴らは秘密工作の隠れ蓑を手に入れ、権力の上層部に潜入した。危機のたびに、奴らが私たちの信頼を獲得し、資源を受け取っていったんだ」
languages.original_text: "Indeed. They probably began by recruiting workers — it is easy to blend in with the labouring riffraff. Posing as a union of technomats, they were able to conceal their secret operations and infiltration into the upper echelons of power. Each new crisis allowed them to gain more of our trust and resources."

traits.locale_text: 「確かに。奴らはおそらく労働者を勧誘し始めたのだろう...労働者の中に紛れ込むのは簡単だからな。テクノマットを装うことで、奴らは秘密工作の隠れ蓑を手に入れ、権力の上層部に潜入した。危機のたびに、奴らが私たちの信頼を獲得し、資源を受け取っていったんだ」
「確かに。奴らはおそらく労働者を勧誘し始めたのだろう...労働者の中に紛れ込むのは簡単だからな。テクノマットを装うことで、奴らは秘密工作の隠れ蓑を手に入れ、権力の上層部に潜入した。危機のたびに、奴らが私たちの信頼を獲得し、資源を受け取っていったんだ」

languages.text: « En effet. Ils ont sans doute commencé par recruter des ouvriers... Il est en effet plus facile de se fondre dans la foule. En se faisant passer pour des technomates, ils ont créé une couverture pour leurs opérations secrètes d'infiltration au sein des échelons supérieurs de la hiérarchie. Chaque crise leur a permis de gagner notre confiance et de mettre la main sur nos ressources. »
languages.original_text: "Indeed. They probably began by recruiting workers — it is easy to blend in with the labouring riffraff. Posing as a union of technomats, they were able to conceal their secret operations and infiltration into the upper echelons of power. Each new crisis allowed them to gain more of our trust and resources."

traits.locale_text: « En effet. Ils ont sans doute commencé par recruter des ouvriers... Il est en effet plus facile de se fondre dans la foule. En se faisant passer pour des technomates, ils ont créé une couverture pour leurs opérations secrètes d'infiltration au sein des échelons supérieurs de la hiérarchie. Chaque crise leur a permis de gagner notre confiance et de mettre la main sur nos ressources. »

languages.text: "In der Tat. Sie fingen vermutlich damit an, Arbeiter zu rekrutieren ... es ist einfach, sich unter den Pöbel zu mischen. Als vermeintliche Union von Technomaten konnten sie ihre geheimen Operationen verbergen und die höheren Ebenen der Macht infiltrieren. Mit jeder neuen Krise erlangten sie mehr Vertrauen und Ressourcen von uns."
languages.original_text: "Indeed. They probably began by recruiting workers — it is easy to blend in with the labouring riffraff. Posing as a union of technomats, they were able to conceal their secret operations and infiltration into the upper echelons of power. Each new crisis allowed them to gain more of our trust and resources."

traits.locale_text: "In der Tat. Sie fingen vermutlich damit an, Arbeiter zu rekrutieren ... es ist einfach, sich unter den Pöbel zu mischen. Als vermeintliche Union von Technomaten konnten sie ihre geheimen Operationen verbergen und die höheren Ebenen der Macht infiltrieren. Mit jeder neuen Krise erlangten sie mehr Vertrauen und Ressourcen von uns."

"In der Tat. Sie haben vermutlich begonnen, die Arbeiter zu rekrutieren. In der Masse kann man leicht untertauchen. Als Technomaten verkleidet hatten sie eine Tarnung für ihre geheimen Operationen und ihre Infiltration der obersten Ebenen der Macht. Jede Krise gestattete ihnen, unser Vertrauen zu gewinnen und unsere Ressourcen zu empfangen."

languages.text: "Gerçekten de öyle. Muhtemelen işçileri işe alarak başladılar. İşçi sınıfıyla muhatap olunca göze batmamak daha kolay. Kendilerini teknomat sendikasından gibi göstererek gizli operasyonlarını gerçekleştirmek ve daha yüksek güç mertebelerine sızmak için bir paravan oluşturdular. Her bir kriz, güvenimizi ve kaynaklarımızı kazanmalarına olanak tanıdı."
languages.original_text: "Indeed. They probably began by recruiting workers — it is easy to blend in with the labouring riffraff. Posing as a union of technomats, they were able to conceal their secret operations and infiltration into the upper echelons of power. Each new crisis allowed them to gain more of our trust and resources."

traits.locale_text: "Gerçekten de öyle. Muhtemelen işçileri işe alarak başladılar. İşçi sınıfıyla muhatap olunca göze batmamak daha kolay. Kendilerini teknomat sendikasından gibi göstererek gizli operasyonlarını gerçekleştirmek ve daha yüksek güç mertebelerine sızmak için bir paravan oluşturdular. Her bir kriz, güvenimizi ve kaynaklarımızı kazanmalarına olanak tanıdı."
